data.name: Bowerwhelm
data.detailed_description:
Bowerwhelm is a pure rogue-like experience. We've removed all the elements from the game until the pure rogue-like experience is left alone. As a result of this; a minimalist game has been created that aims to offer pure fun.

TRY TO NOT GET OVERWHELMED
Start with a basic bow and unlimited arrows. You're wrong if you think unlimited arrows make you unbeaten, enemies getting stronger and stronger every second. There are two ways not to die in this game. Either you have very good aiming skills or you choose upgrades wisely at every level.

BUILD DECKS
Collect coins by killing golden enemies and buy new skills. Equip and upgrade the skills that fit your style of play. If you're good at aiming, equip skills that strengthen your attack. If you like to play fast, you can equip skills that increase your mobility. Or mix it and create your unique style of play.
